name: Wild Animal Sniper Shoot
description:
You are a professional hunter with a cap on your head and a long rang gun in your hand. The African jungle among the wild animals, a professional shooter with great skills can survive under such fearful situation. The test of your great skills will begin here as the animals are moving rapidly and also very dangerous. we offers this brand new game for you to test your shootint skills and hunting experience. If you are afraid from these dangerous animals in real life then try this Wild Animal Sniper Shoot game with real jungle environment.
with a new gun in your hand you will survive in this danderoug junle among these animals.it is a difficult task to hit the running animals and requires great sniper shooting skills to full fill the task.

Wild Animal Sniper Shoot: Features

A fine hunting action game
High quality graphics
Real life jungle environment
smooth gamplay
Zoom featured armory
